arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown: {/c}{c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat_Effect_Chance_Script_Formula_Override:19}|%|]{/c}
{/if}{c_label}Passive:{/c} {c_number}{SF_23}{/c} |4poison creeper:poison creepers; periodically |4emerges:emerge; from the ground every {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} seconds, applying {c_number}{dot:TOOLTIP_PET_POISON}{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}{buffduration:TOOLTIP_PET_POISON}{/c} seconds to an enemy in the area.

{c_label}Active:{/c} Vines strangle all surrounding enemies, Immobilizing them for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_STRANGLE}{/c} seconds and Poisoning them for {c_number}{dot:ACTIVE_POISON}{/c} damage over {c_number}{buffduration:ACTIVE_POISON}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Poison Creeper's{/c} Immobilize duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} second.
{c_important}Poison Creeper's{/c} active Poisoning duration is increased by {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} seconds.
Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%+|]{/c} against enemies strangled by {c_important}Poison Creeper{/c}.
